entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:25 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -41.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -41.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa steady
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -45.4°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
